attributes.action: change MP allowances paid for carrying out their duties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All employess are responsible for their own travel expenses to their normal place of work. MP's are Civil Servants. Civil Servants carryimg out duties away from their usual office claim receipted expenses travel costs, receipted costs for meals within strict limits,hotels within limits,up to a limit of £20 for an evening meal plus an additional £5 for "personal expenses" MP's are Civil Servants and should be paid likewise

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
